data.name: XFormControllerListener
desc: allows to be notified when the activation status of a FormController changes.
A form controller is activated if a form control gains the focus and none of its controls currently owned the focus before.

methods.name: formActivated
desc: is invoked when a control of the controller gained the focus and the controller was not previously activated.

methods.name: formDeactivated
desc: is invoked when a control of the \"XFormController\" lost the focus and no control of the controller received the focus.
In other words, no control of the controller owns the focus.
